text: The main way you can discover new spells in Scriptor is through Ancient Tomes!
These handy pieces of loot can be dusted off to discover a complete, usually usable spell!
While these can be cast outright, their real power is in helping you discover new
Check out $(l:casting/spellbooks)Spellbooks$(/l) to learn more about casting through Spellbooks.
You can find Ancient Tomes in the wild in various locations.
By default, they are often found in places such as the following:

pages.name: Trading
pages.text: Villagers can help you trade down tomes.

text: If you have too many high-tier tomes and have already obtained all the spells in that tier,
Librarian villagers are often willing to trade a higher tier tome for 2-3 of a lower tier.
Some spells you find might be too costly to use outright.
You can learn about this and other reasons spells may fizzle in the
Oftentimes, found spells that fizzle contain very powerful or rare components,
so it can be a good idea to either add cost-reducing Descriptors or rework the
spell otherwise to discover what these components do.
